page.title: 07LIFE STYLES:A 1985 CHILD
page.content: BEING A CHILD IS MOST ENJOYABLE BUT IT HAS ITS PROBLEMS.FOR INSTANCE I HAVE A BROTHER AND HE IS ALWAYS GETTING INTO MY ROOM AND MESSING THINGS UP,BROTHERS ARE LIKE THAT.I KNOW TWO OR THREE CHILDREN WHO WILL BE GLAD TO LEAVE SCHOOL BECAUSE THEY DONT ENJOY IT.BEING A CHILD IS QUITE NICE,THOUGH YOU OFTEN GET AN ARGUMENT OR TWO,BECAUSE WHEN YOU ARE GROWN UP YOU CAN'T REALLY PLAY ON A GO-CART,CAN YOU?I SHOULDN'T THINK GROWN-UPS WOULD LIKE TO GO ON A SKATEBOARD,WOULD YOU? BESIDES, GROWN-UPS DON'T GET SO MANY PRESENTS AT CHRISTMAS TIME, NOT THAT IT MATTERS ANYWAY. I THINK IT'S RATHER AWKWARD TO BE A PARENT ESPECIALLY WHEN YOU'VE GOT TO DRIVE THE CHILDREN TO PLACES AND GIVE THEM MONEY ETC. WHAT MUMS AND DADS NEED IS A REST BUT THE PROBLEM IS THEY NEVER GET IT!
